snippet: The last commercial airline accident that resulted in deaths of passengers was four years ago, the longest such span for decades. And the previous span between accidents was the longest before now.
lead_paragraph: The last commercial airline accident that resulted in deaths of passengers was four years ago, the longest such span for decades. And the previous span between accidents was the longest before now.

headline.seo: Longer Spans Without Serious Airline Accidents
headline.main: Longer Spans Without Serious Airline Accidents
